law.catch_line: Municipal right to license auctioneers and auction house operators.
law.text: No municipality or other political subdivision shall regulate, tax, or license any licensee except for those administrative regulations, taxes, or licenses which may be reasonably imposed or required among all persons engaged in business generally.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 344, sec. 16, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 16, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 80, sec. 6, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 251, sec. 20.
